title: Rise of industrial America: the rise of labor
creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Educational Corporation
brief_description:
Traces the history of the American labor movement. Discusses the working conditions from the 1800s to the present, the effects of early strikes in changing governmental attitudes towards labor. Also the organisation of the American Federation of Labor and the Congress of Industrial Organizations.
Suitable for upper secondary level.
